articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Chris Hayes: A war with Iran is madness, and don’t believe...
articles.description: Chris Hayes ends the show with this message: "A war with Iran is madness, and it is strategically and morally a disaster in the making. And don't believe anyone who tells you otherwise."

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Steve Schmidt: We’re at the ‘most dangerous moment in the...
articles.description: Steve Schmidt tells Chris Hayes that we stand at the most dangerous moment in the Middle East that we’ve lived through following the attack on U.S. forces in Iraq.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Engel: This is a 'symbolic moment' for Iran, Supreme Leader wants world to know it fought back
articles.description: Richard Engel reports from Erbil, Iraq as Iran claims credit for multiple missile attacks on military bases in Iraq housing U.S. forces.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Iranian State TV: Supreme Leader of Iran Ayatollah Khamenei coordinating attacks on U.S. forces in Iraq
articles.description: Ali Arouzi, NBC News Tehran Bureau Chief, tells Chris Hayes that Iranian State TV is reporting that the Supreme Leader of Iran Ayatollah Khamenei is coordinating attacks on U.S. forces in Iraq.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: McConnell rolls out Trump Trial Plan without witnesses, Democrats say it’s a 'cover-up'
articles.description: Senator Mcconnell is moving to begin the Trump trial and leave the witness debate for later, echoing the Clinton trial precedent. It comes as Trump is prepping his defense and key witness, John Bolton, agrees to testify if subpoenaed.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Iran says second wave of missiles have been launched
articles.description: NBC News Tehran Bureau Chief Ali Arouzi reports that a second wave of missiles has been launched by Iran.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Rand Paul on Soleimani: Killing a general from another country...
articles.description: On the assassination of Soleimani, Senator Rand Paul says "I think killing a major general from another country is an act of war."

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Pentagon acknowledges Iran launched more than a dozen...
articles.description: According to NBC News Correspondent Courtney Kube, the Pentagon acknowledged Iran launched more than a dozen ballistic missiles targeting Iraqi military bases housing US troops. Kube says, “This is a much more serious attack in that a missile versus a rocket …

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Iran claims credit for launching strikes against Iraqi base...
articles.description: Iran claimed credit for launching strikes on Iraqi base that houses US troops. Richard Engel says, “They want the world to know Iran did this.”

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Rocket attack on Iraqi base housing US troops
articles.description: Iraq's al-Asad airbase, which houses US troops, has been hit with a rocket attack.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Breaking: Rocket attack on Iraqi base housing U.S. troops
articles.description: Days after the ordered airstrike on Iranian leader Qassem Soleimani, rockets hit an airbase in Iraq targeting U.S. troops.  The  New York Times reporting Iran’s revolutionary guard is taking responsibility for the attack. MSNBC’s Ayman Mohyeldin joins Ari Mel…
